title: yOjaya pada
sahitya:
yOjaya pada nalinEna mE matim vibhO jaya raghuvIra


anupallavi

  shrI jita manasija mathita subAhO shrta dattAbhaya dakSiNa bAhO


caraNam 1    mahiLA la;Ama shrI kausalyA kalita marakata tulA kOTi madhupakulEna mahanIya dasharatha mahArAjOtsAnga mandanOcita bAlya kELikEna bahala rAgOjvala vidruma vijaya pravINa mrdu lAnguli dala vilasitEna bahu mahimOnnatisam sucana paTu bandhurAri darAnkushAngkita (pANi) talEna
    caraNam 2    savana samtavara mAna kaushikatApasa saha gamana punarukta rakta bharENa hava 
vidhi vinihita carita gautamApata pAtakau ghatamOni vahami harENa bava kArmuka 
latikArOpaNa kELi bhAsurAnguSThA namita vasudhEna
    caraNam 3    pari pATita rAvaNa kaNThATavivi pATishONita panka kalangitEna pari caraNa virahadUna sItAkara parama sukha samghaTana paTima vahEna bharata pratyarpita maNImaya pAduka bhAsamAna mayUkha mayaka kacacEna cira virahAtura sAkEta janatapta citta shalya samuddharaNa caturENa
    caraNam 4    suratati makuTa virAjita sura druma surabhi kusuma dhUli parimalitEna surucira tanu su-pratika madAvala sundara kramabhAngi haraNa caNEna taraNI kulOcita (rati?tara) simhAsana tala kalita talimAnkamadhishayitEna parama tapOdhana maNDala mAnasa pangajAli vihAri kalahamsEna
